mapper.insert: insert into sys_oper_log (oper_id, title, action, method, channel, login_name, dept_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_param, status, error_msg, oper_time) values (#{operId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_oper_log set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_url = #{operUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_ip = #{operIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_param = #{operParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_time = #{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where oper_id = #{operId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select oper_id, title, action, method, channel, login_name, dept_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_param, status, error_msg, oper_time from sys_oper_log where oper_id = #{operId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select oper_id, title, action, method, channel, login_name, dept_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_param, status, error_msg, oper_time from sys_oper_log
